name: SEER Regional Nodes
title: SEER Regional Nodes
notes:
**Note 1:**  Code only regional nodes and nodes, NOS, in this field.  Distant nodes are coded in SEER Mets.

**Note 2:** Splenic lymph nodes and those located at the tail of the pancreas are not considered regional and should be coded SEER Mets.
footnotes:
\### Considered distant in Historic Stage
\*** Considered distant in 1977 Summary Stage Guide
